name: ABPeoplePickerNavigationController
desc: The ABPeoplePickerNavigationController class (whose instances are known as people-picker navigation controllers) implements a view controller that manages a set of views that allow the user to select a contact or one of its contact-information items from an address book.DeprecatedUse CNContactPickerViewController instead.

items.name: protocol ABPeoplePickerNavigationControllerDelegate
items.desc: The ABPeoplePickerNavigationControllerDelegate protocol describes the interface ABPeoplePickerNavigationController delegates must adopt to respond to people-picker user events.

items.name: var displayedProperties: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The properties (such as name or telephone number) the picker displays when it shows a person.

items.name: var addressBook: ABAddressBook?
items.desc: Optional; the address book from which to obtain the list of contacts.

items.name: var predicateForEnablingPerson: NSPredicate?
items.desc: Optionally determines if a person can be selected.

items.name: var predicateForSelectionOfPerson: NSPredicate?
items.desc: Optionally determines if a selected person should be returned to the app or displayed.

items.name: var predicateForSelectionOfProperty: NSPredicate?
items.desc: Optionally determines if a selected property should be returned to the app or if the default action for the property should be performed
